name: How To Kiss A Falling Petal
name_original: How To Kiss A Falling Petal
description:
Description:

How To Kiss A Falling Petal is a 2D Metroidvania action adventure game based on Hollow Knight. The game takes you to a small town that suffered from wraith attack and darkness infection created by nightcrawlers in the undercity. In this game, you are a maid of the Pristress. The Pristress is able to bless and cure people with infection but her power is weakening as darkness grows. Therefore, you decided to go down to the undercity, hoping to find the Flower Of Light to cure darkness for your loved one. However, as you go deeper and deeper, the truth of this world unveils to you. 

Controls: 

arrow keys to move

Z to jump/double jump

X to melee attack

C to dash

quick A to range attack

hold A for a second and release to recover health

Space to interact and arrows to navigate options

A to K keys to play flute while sitting on the chair

Developer:

May Chen, Crona Xu
